notification.content:
Thank you for playing FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
5 Mythril has been sent to you following the issue with the Golden Shield (VI) banner image.
It will appear as "From the FFRK Team" in your Item Chest.

We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
notification.title: (Mythril Sent) Golden Shield (VI) Banner Image

notification.content:
Bonus Drop Rate for Crystal Gloves (VII) and Silver Barrette (VII)! 5★ Crystal Gloves (VII), 5★ Silver Barrette (VII), and 5★ Wizard Bracelet (VII) added to Relic Draw!
Crystal Gloves (VII) and Silver Barrette (VII) have a drop rate bonus through 4:59 PM 8/14 PST (12:59 AM 8/15 UTC)!

Crystal Gloves (VII)
Type: Fists
Soul Break: Waterkick (Tifa)
Effect: Deal 3 attacks to a single target.

Silver Barrette (VII)
Type: Hairpin
Soul Break: Trine (Red XIII)
Effect: Deal magic lightning damage to all targets.

The Relic Synergy from FINAL FANTASY VII equipment will give your party a leg up during the ongoing Battle Arena event!
Use the Waterkick Soul Break to send your enemies reeling!

FINAL FANTASY VII Shared Soul Break Equipment Added!5★ Wizard Bracelet (VII) has a Shared Soul Break!

Wizard Bracelet (VII)
Type: Bracer
Soul Break: Snowstorm
Effect: Deal magic ice damage to all targets.
5★ FINAL FANTASY VII Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Drop rate bonus for Wizard Bracelet (VII) - Shared Soul Break, Shark (VII) - Shared Soul Break, Full Metal Staff (VII) - Shared Soul Break, Edincoat (VII) and Butterfly Edge (VII)!
Use the Relic Synergies from FF VII equipment to strike fast and hard in the ongoing Battle Arena event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Restore Tifa’s Hero Record! The Gold Saucer Battle Arena challenge event launched at 5:00 PM 8/4 PST (1:00 AM 8/5 UTC).

Event Times 5:00 PM 8/4 PST (1:00 AM 8/5 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/14 PST (12:59 AM 8/15 UTC)

Rewards Recruit Tifa to your ranks.
Get a Tifa Memory Crystal.
Use a Tifa Memory Crystal to break her level cap!

See Event Rules for more details.

New Abilities The following 4 abilities are being introduced along with the latest event:
-Chi Blast (2★ Monk Ability)
-Chakra (3★ Monk Ability)
-Pressure Point (4★ Monk Ability)
-Shellga (4★ White Magic Ability)

New Quests The following 3 quests are being introduced along with the latest event:
-Hone the monk ability Chi Blast.
-Hone the monk ability Chakra.
-Hone the monk ability Pressure Point.

The more quests you complete, the more rewards you’ll get!
notification.title: New Event Underway

notification.content:
"Blessing of the Mystic Mountain" Login Bonus!

The mines of the mystic mountain overflow with Mythril! To show our gratitude for everyone's efforts in restoring the records, we'll be giving a special Daily Login Bonus!

Receive 1 Mythril every day!
Available from 5:00 PM 7/13 PST (1:00 AM 7/14 UTC) until 4:59 PM 8/12 PST (12:59 AM 8/13 UTC)

Just log in each day to claim the Mythril!
notification.title: Blessing of the Mystic Mountain

notification.content:
Open-Weight Division Added! An Open-Weight Division has been added to the ongoing Battle Arena event!

Unlock the Open-Weight Division after mastering the Champion Division for the Knight’s Path and Mage’s Path.
Complete the Knight’s Open-Weight Division to get the new Champion Belt accessory!

Take on the challenge of the final battles in the Knight’s Path and Mage’s path!


See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: Open-Weight Division Added

notification.content:
The FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper service will be down for maintenance during the following times as we introduce several new features.

Maintenance Times
10:00 PM 8/9 PST (6:00 AM 8/10 UTC) to 4:00 AM 8/10 PST (12:00 PM 8/10 UTC)
*Maintenance may be extended without warning.

All game servers will be unavailable during maintenance, and the game will not be playable.
Players in a dungeon when maintenance begins may lose their progress, items, and any Stamina spent to enter the dungeon, so please use caution when playing immediately before maintenance.
Any resulting losses are the responsibility of the player, so please be sure to stop playing and exit the game before maintenance begins.

The following features will be implemented:

Soul Break Mastery -Characters now earn Mastery points when battling in equipment with Unique Soul Breaks they can use. When the Unique Soul Break’s Mastery bar is full, the character has mastered the Soul Break.
-Once a Soul Break has been mastered, the character can still use the Soul Break even without the corresponding piece of equipment.
*Shared Soul Breaks and the Unique Soul Breaks of other characters cannot be mastered.

Bring 4 Soul Breaks into Battle -Characters can now choose from up to 4 available Soul Breaks to use during battle. You can assign these Soul Breaks from the Camp Screen, even while in a dungeon.
*Assigned Soul Breaks must be chosen from the character’s Default Soul Break, Mastered Soul Breaks, and Soul Breaks on current equipment.

Friend Invite Campaign! -Invite your friends to play FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
-You and the friend you invite both receive rewards.
-See the Friend Invite page for details on how to invite a friend and the related rewards.
-Access the Friend Invite page by selecting Menu -> Friends.


Remove All -The main Party Screen now has a “Remove All” command.
-Remove All allows you to remove all equipment, abilities, or Record Materia at once.
-You can choose to Remove All from characters in the current party, or characters outside the current party.
-You can choose to remove only a single category at a time (equipment, abilities, or Record Materia).

Enemy HP Display -Enemy HP is now displayed in all dungeons.

Toggle AUTO Battle Always On -You can now set AUTO Battle to ON to always begin battle in AUTO Battle mode, so you don’t have to manually turn it on at the beginning of each battle.

Character Skip Settings -You can now choose two different ways to skip between characters’ turns in battle.
-ATB Order: Skipping the current character passes the active turn to the next character in the order in which their ATB gauges reached full.
-Party Order: Skipping the current character passes the active turn to the topmost character in the party with a full ATB gauge.

Increased Inventory -The equipment inventory can now be expanded up to a maximum of 500 slots.
*The number of ability slots has not changed.

The content of the above features may change without notice.
We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!
notification.title: Maintenance Notice

notification.content:
This is an important notice for players of SQUARE ENIX games on the iOS platform.

Apple has officially announced the release of its iOS 9 Beta. Please note that if you install the iOS 9 Beta on your device, SQUARE ENIX apps may encounter malfunctions such as performance errors or loss of data, or perhaps even fail to deliver in-game currency purchased with real money.

Since our apps are not compatible with the iOS 9 Beta at this time, we regret we are unable to provide customer support for any trouble arising from installation of this OS (including, but not limited to, data recovery or undelivered in-game currencies). Please be aware that SQUARE ENIX will not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for loss or damages of any kind incurred by installing or using the iOS 9 Beta with relation to SQUARE ENIX apps.

For further information, please also see Apple's "Frequently Asked Questions."
https://beta.apple.com/sp/en/betaprogram/faq
notification.title: Apple iOS 9 Beta Notice
